short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to capture data for Pro-Study Online.
short.nl: Extensie om data vast te leggen voor Pro Study Online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use the Pro-Study Extension to save research into your Pro-Study database. Simply right click on some highlighted text or an image in your web browser to capture it.

All captured content will be saved and organised into the categories within your Pro-Study projects.

The Extension will allow you to:

• Capture Text
• Capture Images
• Capture reference information
• Lookup ISBN and DOI numbers
• Use the Research Assistant 
• Make reading lists
• Screenshot
• Use OCR
• Convert all font to Open Dyslexic Font
• Use your Webcam


Login to Pro-Study Online and use the tools available to further organise your research and to produce fully referenced assignments and reports.
long.nl:
You can use the Pro-Study Extension to save research into your Pro-Study database. Simply right click on some highlighted text or an image in your web browser to capture it.

All captured content will be saved and organised into the categories within your Pro-Study projects.

The Extension will allow you to:

•	Capture Text
•	Capture Images
•	Auto Tile
•	Bookmark
•	Screenshot
•	Convert all font to Open Dyslexic Font
•	Use your Webcam

Login to Pro-Study Online and use the tools available to further organise your research and to produce fully referenced reports.
